data.title: How do I add label data in the Pareto diagram? â€“ Q&A Hub
data.meta_description: Find professional answers about "How do I add label data in the Pareto diagram?" in 365 Data Science's Q&A Hub. Join today!
data.text:
Hi Daniel,

thanks for reaching out! To add labels to a line chart on a combination chart in Excel, you can do the following.

Right click on the line chart first and make sure it's selected.

Then go to Chart Design, and on the lefthandside of the ribbon select Add Chart Elements. Scroll down to Data Labels, and finally select the positioning of your line chart labels.

Hope this helps!

Best,

365 Eli
